columns.name: organisation_path
columns.dc:title: Organisation Path
columns.schema:description: A sequence of colon separated Organisation Keys that fully specifies the Provider Organisation providing a service to the client.

columns.name: twb_recommendation_out_key
columns.dc:title: TWB Recommendation Out Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to each recommendation out. The Recommendation Out Key is unique and stable for each recommendation out at the lvel of the organisation.

columns.name: episode_key
columns.dc:title: Episode Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to each PMHC MDS episode. The Episode Key is unique and stable for each episode at the level of the organisation. This key must link to an existing episode within the PMHC MDS.

columns.name: twb_recommendation_out_provider_type
columns.dc:title: TWB Recommendation Out - Provider Type
columns.schema:description: What type of external service(s) has the client been recommended to from The Way Back during their Episode of care?

columns.name: twb_recommendation_out_status
columns.dc:title: TWB Recommendation Out - Status
columns.schema:description: What is the current status of external service recommendations made to the client?
